Luxury Appliance Repair in Los Feliz, CA

Precision Repairs for Homes Where Character Meets Luxury

In Los Feliz, charm, style, and sophistication define the neighborhood. From historic Spanish Colonial estates to ultra-modern architectural homes tucked into the hillside, luxury living is everywhere—and so are premium appliances. When they need service, your appliances deserve attention from a company that knows how to blend performance, precision, and discretion.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we proudly offer luxury appliance repair in Los Feliz, specializing in elite brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking, and more. We deliver certified repairs, OEM parts, and white-glove service trusted by homeowners who expect the very best.

🔧 Why Los Feliz Homeowners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified Experts in High-End Brands
    We’re trained by the world’s leading manufacturers to deliver precision service on smart, built-in, and fully customized luxury appliances.
  • ✅ OEM Parts for Lasting Performance
    We only use genuine manufacturer parts—ensuring your appliance runs like new, maintains warranty protection, and preserves its original quality.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service in Los Feliz
    We understand your schedule is important. That's why we offer priority scheduling and ensure our technicians arrive promptly and fully prepared.
  • ✅ White-Glove, Respectful Service
    Our service experience is designed for refined homes. We wear protective gear, work quietly and cleanly, and treat your space with the utmost respect.

🛠️ What We Repair in Los Feliz

❄️ Luxury Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Cooling inconsistencies
  • Ice maker failures
  • Water dispenser issues
  • Door seal or built-in integration problems

🔥 Ranges, Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking
  • Oven not heating evenly
  • Burner ignition failures
  • Smart connectivity or touchscreen malfunctions
  • Convection fan or thermostat issues

🚿 High-End Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Water not draining
  • Poor cleaning or drying performance
  • Leaks, error codes, or control panel failures

🧺 Luxury Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, LG Signature, Fisher & Paykel
  • Drum not spinning or draining
  • Dryer overheating or not drying
  • Control board, smart sensor, and connectivity issues

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Wine coolers, espresso machines, steam ovens, warming drawers
  • Temperature problems
  • Water flow or motor issues
  • Smart home integration troubleshooting
